DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Two Doses Oral Valacyclovir Immunocompromised Patients With Uncomplicated Herpes Zoster
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive standard dose oral valacyclovir three time day Days 1-7 . Arm II : Patients receive high dose oral valacyclovir three time day Days 1-7 . Both arm : Patients begin treatment within 72 hour onset zoster rash . Quality life assess Days 1 , 14 , 28 study every 4 week Week 24 . Pain assessed Days 1-28 study , weekly Week 24 . Medical resource utilization assess Days 1 , 8 , 14 , 18 study every 4 week Week 24 . Patients follow every 4 week Week 24 .
